interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Mary Kay TimeWise Luminous Wear Liquid Foundation, Beige 5
Review Date: 2016/08/02
Store: Mary Kay
Product Description: ['Formulated with skin-loving jojoba to provide moisturization and contains a light-reflecting mineral that brightens skin and gives it a more radiant look. Infused with vitamin E and a patented blend of collagen-building peptides for skin that instantly looks firmer, younger and healthier.']
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Color': 'Beige', 'Skin Type': 'Dry,Normal', 'Finish Type': 'Luminous', 'Package Information': 'Bottle', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '6 x 0.2 x 4 inches; 0.64 Ounces', 'Item model number': '038709', 'UPC': '890357850393 571121100783 885612768643 881147860043 885415948938 092510001264 885815414934', 'Manufacturer': 'Chom'}
Review Text: Wonderful foundation.  Covers well (not completely but is buildable and works well).  No color changes and wears all day with no drying.  Recommend highly!
Review Title: Great Foundation!
Rating: 5.0

reference_summary:
Miracalis - Best Face Cream Moisturizer With Advanced Anti Aging Wrinkle Formula. Clinically Proven To Reduce Wrinkle Depth, Smooth Fine Lines & Soften Skin. Cruelty Free, Hypoallergenic
Miracalis
['* Face Moisturizer * Face Anti Aging * Deep Hydration Face Cream * Hydrating Anti Aging Moisturizer * Aging Cream * Hydration Cream For Face * Regenerating Day Cream * Face Moisturizing Cream * Facial Moisturizers Anti Aging * Anti Aging Facial Cream * Hydrating Moisturizer for Face * Deep Moisturizing Face Cream * Face Moisturizer Anti Aging * Moisturizing Cream Anti Aging * Peptide Face Cream * Moisturizer Facial Cream * Deep Face Moisturizer * Hydrating Facial Moisturizer * Best Face Moisturizer Anti Aging * Anti Aging Skin Care * Bare Mineral * Neck Moisturizer * Neck Cream * Skin Cream * Anti Aging Skin', 'Your Face Will Look Lovelier In Only 15 Days!', 'Reduces the depth of your facial wrinkles with daily use.', 'You will quickly look noticeably younger, healthier, and more attractive.', 'Simply apply Miracalis Anti-Aging Moisturizer Cream right after washing your face in the morning and again at night.', 'What About My Skin Type?', 'A safe, gentle, hypoallergenic formula that is tested and recommended for all 4 major skin types: Normal, Sensitive, Dry or Oily Skin', 'Your Shield Against The Signs Of Aging', "Your skin is under daily attack - air pollution, the sun's harmful rays, germs and time itself all wear down your skin's natural barriers. The result is dry, cracked and tired looking skin.", 'Our formula restores the two natural antioxidants (Vitamin E and Co-Enzyme Q10) that your skin needs to properly repair and maintain this barrier.', 'Your skin will look younger, be less sensitive. You will have healthier, attractive and glowing skin again.', '100% Satisfaction Guaranteed, Made in the USA']
{'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.63 x 2.63 x 2.05 inches; 4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'MIR-AAM001', 'UPC': '820103882309 794168056596', 'Manufacturer': 'Miracalis'}
Although I was excited at first that this product would deliver, it caused a reaction after having used for about 3 days.  My undereye area is an issue with slight crepiness (sp?) and fine wrinkles.  I decided to return because of the reaction.  I have realized that sticking with brand name, proven products for the undereye area are always better for me - Murad works better for me and I'll stick with that line.  I'm 59 and cannot afford to experiment with my sensitive skin at this point.  The customer service for this product (Miracalis) is excellent, though!

Exactly what I wanted.  The darker tone is good for checkbones and lighter on the apples of cheeks.  Very natural color - coral and bronze but no glitter which I cannot stand.  Worth every penny!

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Skincare Focus**: The user continues to prioritize effective face moisturizers with anti-aging benefits and deep hydration, reinforcing their commitment to youthful skin health.

- **Makeup Interest**: The user has further developed their interest in color cosmetics, now favoring foundations that provide a natural finish while enhancing the overall appearance. Their recent purchase emphasizes a preference for luminous formulas that improve skin radiance.

- **Product Preference**: They maintain a strong inclination towards well-established, brand-name products known for being clinically proven and suitable for sensitive skin.

- **Skin Sensitivity**: The user remains vigilant regarding skin sensitivity, preferring hypoallergenic and gentle formulations, particularly important in their selection of makeup.

- **Aging Concerns**: They continue to seek effective solutions for fine lines and wrinkles, prioritizing products that promote a youthful appearance.

- **Customer Experience**: The user values high-quality customer service, sharing positive experiences while expecting strong support from brands.

- **Return Policy**: They emphasize a careful purchasing process, ensuring chosen products are unlikely to trigger reactions, which is essential as they expand into color cosmetics.

- **Age Awareness**: At 59 years old, the user seeks reliable solutions that deliver long-term results, reflecting their awareness of aging and commitment to effective beauty care.

Overall, the user exhibits a conscientious approach to beauty, blending skincare and makeup needs while focusing on efficacy, comfort, and dependable support.
